property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Each of your opponent's creatures must attack if able. ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever this creature blocks, untap it after the battle.

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature, ignore any effects that prevent your other creatures from attacking your opponent this turn. (Effects such as summoning sickness and "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players" are ignored. However, this effect doesn't let you attack creatures.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-68 Dramatic Wars: Angel and Demon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-68 Dramatic Wars: Angel and Demon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, ignore any of your creature’s effects that would prevent them from attacking your opponent. (For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players". Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)

property.value: Demon Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, each player discards their hand. {NO CHOICE} (If any player has no cards in their hand, this creature gets the following No Choice ability.) This creature gets +5000 power. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Watermark
property.value: {Bloody} {Soul}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-68 Dramatic Wars: Angel and Demon

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have at least one other Angel Command in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-68 Dramatic Wars: Angel and Demon

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD PLUS} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add the top card of your deck under one of your shields face down. (Each card stack is still considered to be one shield.)) {SHIELD FORCE} (As you put this creature, you may choose one of your shields. While that shield is in your shield zone, this creature gets the following Shield Force abilities.) This creature gets +5500 power and "double breaker".

property.name: Set

card.name: Olgaiza, Dark Demon of the Evil Fortress

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-68 Dramatic Wars: Angel and Demon

property.name: Race
property.value: Dark Monster

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a Demon Command that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Watermark
property.value: {Evil} {Soul}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-68 Dramatic Wars: Angel and Demon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) ■ Put a Darkness psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-68 Dramatic Wars: Angel and Demon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a light psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.value: Demon Command/Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Annihilating Soul Recall 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose 4 cards from your opponent's graveyard, your graveyard, or 4 cards from both graveyards. Put the chosen cards on the bottom of their owner's deck in any order. For each 4 cards chosen, you may use the following {SOUL RECALL}: ability.): {SOUL RECALL}: Your opponent chooses a card in their hand or battle zone and puts it on the bottom of their deck. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Awaken—At the end of your turn, if 3 or more of your opponent's creatures left this turn, flip this creature to its higher cost side.
